page.title: 03B.T.REPEATER STATION CONT.
page.content: It has armour so that if a fishing boat or trawler boat catches it with a net or an anchor it won't get damaged. The walls of the building are 2-3ft thick.The doors are made of steel and weigh 5 tons.There is an air lock room incase there is a nuclear war ,the Navy would have to bring food in,and if they have radiation they would be washed all over to get rid of it. The {Tuckerton}line was laid in 1963,the{Beaver Harbour}line was laid in 1973.If there was a nuclear attack the machines have supplies for 3 months,and water.There are 7000 volts in the Canadian line and 5000 volts in the American line. The temperature has to be kept at a constant 67 degrees.The air is washed to get rid of dirt,flies and moths.
